item.title: By: Panagiotis
item.dc:creator: Panagiotis
item.description:
Hello, since is the first time I leave a comment, congratulations and thank you for your wonderful and helpful site.
I just wanted to add a new use of linetypes ./../../manpage-gnuplot-4-6/index.html#x1-235000III If someone uses linetypes instead of style line where "Unlike line styles, redefinitions by set linetype are persistent; they are not affected by reset."
Panagiotis
(Y.G.I know that this article is "old", but since now we can use this feature, I thought if someone reads this article, it will be good for him to know it)
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
since is the first time I leave a comment, congratulations and thank you for your wonderful and helpful site.

I just wanted to add a new use of linetypes
./../../manpage-gnuplot-4-6/index.html#x1-235000III
If someone uses linetypes instead of style line where
“Unlike line styles, redefinitions by set linetype are persistent; they are not affected by reset.”

Panagiotis

(Y.G.I know that this article is “old”, but since now we can use this feature, I thought if someone reads this article, it will be good for him to know it)

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description:
Hi Saurabh,
I'm afraid you have to post the whole file in order to help you.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Saurabh,

I’m afraid you have to post the whole file in order to help you.

item.title: By: Saurabh
item.dc:creator: Saurabh
item.description: Hi. I am in linux and i am using . G N U P L O T Version 4.6 patchlevel 1 In my home folder there is a file ~/.gnuplot-wxt . But I am not these line . I giving me an error . If i add a line "set macros" #(without ") It is showing some error like this 04:33:36 IST: file '/home/saurabh/.gnuplot-wxt', line 9: '=' expected. 04:33:36 IST: file '/home/saurabh/.gnuplot-wxt', line 10: '=' expected. help me .
item.content:encoded:
Hi.
I am in linux and i am using .
G N U P L O T
Version 4.6 patchlevel 1
In my home folder there is a file ~/.gnuplot-wxt .
But I am not these line .
I giving me an error .
If i add a line
“set macros” #(without “)
It is showing some error like this
04:33:36 IST: file ‘/home/saurabh/.gnuplot-wxt’, line 9: ‘=’ expected.
04:33:36 IST: file ‘/home/saurabh/.gnuplot-wxt’, line 10: ‘=’ expected.
help me .
